title: Omnitruncated simplectic honeycomb
summary: In geometry an omnitruncated simplectic honeycomb or omnitruncated n-simplex honeycomb is an n-dimensional uniform tessellation, based on the symmetry of the A ~ n {\displaystyle {\tilde {A}}_{n}} affine Coxeter group. Each is composed of omnitruncated simplex facets. The vertex figure for each is an irregular n-simplex.
